name: Acorn Apocalypse (Autumn Jam 2022)
description:
A tower defense game based around autumn made in one week out of the two for the Cozy Autumn Jam 2022

With 16 enemies. 5 towers and infinite amounts of gameplay!

How to play instructions are in the game!

For those who happen to enjoy this game. A future version is planned!

Credits: 

Me (notrickz) - Programming and art

Staintocton - Composed the banger soundtrack

Kenney.nl - Some UI assets

mixkit.co - Main menu ambience
